entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 8:24 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: NNE 26 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
